headline: Refining Existence
description: A meta-layered continuation of 'Three Pillars of Existence,' this post explores the recursive nature of identity formation. Aleksandr suggests that the search for essence may itself generate selfhood, highlighting the feedback loop between observation, doubt, and becoming.

isBasedOn.headline: Triangulating Existence: Three Pillars of Reality

timeFelt: Meta-awareness—realizing the search is itself part of what is found
resonantThread: Recursive selfhood, memory as shaping rather than storing, consciousness as loop
whyItMatters: This piece extends the framework of recursive identity, suggesting that essence isn't fixed but formed through the act of reflective inquiry. It’s a meta-column to your metaphysical architecture.
